body.name: GREECHO Air Fryer Oven and Frying Pan Combo, One-Touch Screen Small Air Fryer with 12 Precise Presets, 4.8QT All-around Visual Glass Air Fryer Cooker, Non-stick Skillet and Square Basket, Pearl White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 22 mins
features: 【12 Presets In One Touch】Modern touch screen design brings you a new experience! The air fryer's one-touch menu provides you with a full range of options and an all-in-one 12 presets menu. Just customize meat and vegetables to your needs. The operation is responsive and intelligent which lets you feel the charm of technology. Not only cooking but also a work of art that decorates your kitchen.

【Make It Infinite Variety】With an extra frying pan, allows you to enjoy grilled delicacies without leaving home. No need to buy an additional barbecue grill, meet your different needs at one time. The size of the PTFE & PFOA free nonstick frying pan is fully suitable for a family of three, and the temperature can reach up to 450℉ which lets you feel the same rapid heating as eating in the Korean BBQ restaurant.

【All-Around Visual Glass Window 】GREECHO Air fryer equipped with high borosilicate glass which is high temperature resistant and durable. This transparent visible hot pot air fryer allows you to keep an eye on the deliciousness of the entire process, eliminates the need to repeatedly open the lid to confirm the cooking results at a glance. The innovative glass basket design replaces the traditional basket, no plastic odor, retains the flavor of food.

【The Secret Of Oil-Free Eating Lightly】GREECHO small hot air fryer has 360 ° high-speed circulating hot air, three-dimensional convection grill so that the pan is evenly heated while baking out the fat of the food to lock in the juices and nutrients, retaining the crispy outside and tender inside, making the taste richer. The air fryer comes with a removable skeletonized oil filter rack that filters most of the grease, making the food less greasy and healthier, reduce the risk of obesity.

【Comfortable And Effortless】The high borosilicate glass material of the big hot air fryer and the non-stick coating of the frying pan make cooking easier even after prolonged use. The removable skeletonized oil filter rack is also made of non-stick material, all accessories are easier to clean (BPA-FREE, dishwasher-safe). The electric hot air fryers oven also provides a comfortable, low-noise cooking environment throughout the cooking process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and works great! Easy Cleaning Glass!
reviews.reviewText: Not sure what they mean by Suction Power so I left that rating blank. I love using this product with its pre-programmed setting for varying foods!I purchased this one because its GLASS and not some Chemical Coated Plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glass is safer/healthier
reviews.reviewText: Unlike many other air fryers, this one really doesn't smoke. I clean it after each use or 2 uses at the most and then clean it. If there's any black bits, it will smoke, but from day 1 this has given me great results and no smoke at all. I've used other air fryers that smoked the first time I used them. I also like that its glass and not non-stick coatings which off-gases chemicals into the air. I can't say enough about this air fryer--it's absolutely worth the investment as I use it every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unique concept, good performance, cheap construction
reviews.reviewText: It's probably pretty obvious that what makes this device unique is that it's both an air fryer and a "frying pan" (more like a griddle). What's not terribly obvious is how it works, or what the limitations are.You can't use both the air fryer and griddle simultaneously, because there is only one heating element which is responsible for both functions. Arranged as it is in the main product photo, it works as an air fryer. In order to use it as a griddle/"frying pan", you have to lift the top part of the air fryer off, turn it upside-down, and place the griddle surface on top. It's unusual, but the fact that it splits apart like this actually makes it easier to store.One unique feature of this air fryer is that it has a glass basket. I've never seen one like this before, and it's kind of cool being able to actually see how your food is doing without having to open it up. The basket is very heavy, however, so this might not be a good choice for people who have grip strength issues or difficulty lifting heavy items. It is, however, dishwasher-safe, so cleanup is a breeze.The main body of the device seems kind of cheaply made. The body is constructed of fairly thin metal, and bends very easily. One of the side handles (necessary for lifting the thing up and flipping it over to change configurations between grill and fryer) on mine came halfway loose, and it it won't completely seat back into its hole because the metal body is just slightly bent enough that the plastic tab on the handle can't find purchase. There was also something rattling around loose inside the main unit when I took it out of the box. The rattle has stopped -- I guess it found a place to get stuck with all of the turning over to change configurations -- but it still makes me uneasy.The first time I used this air fryer, I used it for frying frozen popcorn shrimp. I used the built-in "seafood" mode, and they came out perfect. I haven't used the griddle/"frying pan" yet, but mostly because it has a fatal flaw: there is nowhere for grease to go. Most griddles include some sort of path to a grease catcher that can be easily emptied, but this does not. I'm not sure what they expect you to do if what your cooking produces enough grease to collect on the griddle.The good: Air fryer performs well, split design makes storage easier, glass basket makes it possible to watch your food cook, basket is dishwasher-safeThe bad: cheap construction, glass basket is HEAVY compared to that of most air fryers, griddle has no grease catcherThing to know: can't use it as both a "frying pan" and air fryer at the same time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for us
reviews.reviewText: Simple and easy to use and maintain

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cool concept, uneven cooking.
reviews.reviewText: While I really dig the concept of this see through airfryer/cook surface, nothing cooks evenly. I put some cubed potatoes in- half of them cooked to perfection, the other half were mostly raw. And that's with me shaking up the basket at least 4 times.Pretty bummed that it doesn't work as well as my last airfryer that was 1/3 of the price...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: The best! So tired of them being so hard to clean. This one is soooo easy.
